summary: All 6 requirements (REQ-1 through REQ-6) have been implemented. The diff shows: (1) 'Stay Connected' checkbox on client login using localStorage/sessionStorage, (2) profile menu with client name and disconnect button, (3) notification bell displaying global announcements, (4) backend notification storage and retrieval with timestamps, (5) admin UI to send individual notifications via modal, and (6) notification bell showing both global announcements and individual notifications with unread counts and clear functionality.
